original_text: For the Son of God, Jesus Christ, who was preached among you by us—by me and Silas and Timothy—was not “Yes” and “No,” but in him it has always been “Yes.”
korean_text: 우리 곧 나와 실루아노와 디모데로 말미암아 너희 가운데 전파된 하나님의 아들 예수 그리스도는 예 하고 아니라 함이 되지 아니하셨으니 그에게는 예만 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: For the Son of God, Jesus Christ
who was preached among you by us
by me and Silas and Timothy
but in him it has always been 'Yes'
